data.title: Roy Orbison
data.text:
[1] Hendersonville Hospital, Hendersonville, TN.

Father: Orbie Lee Orbison (worker)

Mother: Nadine (nurse)

Brother: Grady Orbison

Wife: Claudette Frady (m. 1957, d. 1966, three children)

Wife: Barbara Anne Marie Wilhonnen Jacobs (m. 1969, until his death, d. 6-Dec-2011, two children)

The Traveling Wilburys Vocalist/Guitarist 1988

Rock and Roll Hall of Fame 1987

Songwriters Hall of Fame

Nashville Songwriters Hall of Fame

Rockabilly Hall of Fame

Grammy Best Country Performance Duo Or Group (with Emmylou Harris) (1980)

Grammy Best Spoken Word Or Non-Musical Recording (with the Class of '55 Recording Sessions) (1986)

Grammy Best Country Vocal Collaboration (with kd lang) (1988)

Grammy Best Rock Performance By A Duo Or Group With Vocal (with the Traveling Wilburys) (1989)

Grammy Best Pop Vocal Performance, Male (1990)

Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award:1998

Grammy Hall of Fame Award (1999)

Grammy Hall of Fame Award (1999)

Grammy Hall of Fame Award (2002)

Heart Bypass Operation triple (1978)

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

Chuck Berry Hail! Hail! Rock 'n' Roll (18-Sep-1987) · Himself

Roadie (13-Jun-1980) · Himself

The Fastest Guitar Alive (1-Sep-1967)
